Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani fired Les Bleus in front in the first half.
Ousmane Dembele curled home superbly on 54 minutes.
Dodi Lukebakio hit the post early on.
Mike Maignan made a crucial save after Lukebakio's attempt.
Kylian Mbappe went close on three occasions after coming on as a substitute.
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps eased the pressure with a win over Belgium.
Belgium started well but lacked ideas after France opened the scoring.
Kevin De Bruyne tried to get things going for Belgium but they were hardly a threat in the second half.
N'Golo Kante was instrumental in France gaining control and played a role in both goals.
